[[File:15 Year Party Supplies Key Art.jpg|thumb|Key art]]

'''15 Year Party Supplies''' is an official [[add-on]] developed by [[Oreville Studios]] released to celebrate the [[15th anniversary]] of ''[[Minecraft]]''. Multiple features from this add-on are used in the [[15 Year Journey]] map.

== Additions ==
=== Items ===
* [[File:15 Year Balloon.png|32px|class=pixel-image]][[File:15 Year Balloon render.png|32px]] 15 Year Balloon
** Spawns balloons in a "15" shape attached to the block below when {{control|used}}.
** While balloons can be placed in the air, they don't float upward, unlike [[Balloon|balloons]] {{in|edu}}.

* [[File:15 Year Candle.png|32px|class=pixel-image]] 15 Year Candle
** Used to craft 15 year cakes
** Crafted using one [[string]], one [[honeycomb]], and one [[gold ingot]].
** Cannot be placed on its own or on [[Cake|Cakes]], it is only a crafting ingredient.
** Has the Common [[Rarity]], but uses a orange text in-game.

* [[File:15 Year Party Supplies Handbook.png|32px|class=pixel-image]]15 Year Party Supplies Handbook
** Guides player on how to craft a 15 year cake, and the various items party villagers give.

* [[File:Black Party Horn.png|32px|class=pixel-image]][[File:Black Party Horn render.png|32px]] Black Party Horn
** Shows an animation of the party horn being blown and extending when {{control|used}}.
** Has a short cooldown.
** Each party horn plays a different sound, to add variety.

* [[File:Blue Balloon (15 Year Party Supplies).png|32px|class=pixel-image]][[File:Blue Balloon (15 Year Party Supplies) render.png|32px]] Blue Balloon
** Spawns a blue balloon attached to the block below when {{control|used}}.

* [[File:Blue Party Horn.png|32px|class=pixel-image]][[File:Blue Party Horn render.png|32px]] Blue Party Horn
** Shows an animation of the party horn being blown and extending when {{control|used}}.
** Has a short cooldown.

* [[File:Bubble Machine.png|32px|class=pixel-image]][[File:Bubble Machine render.png|32px]] Bubble Machine
** Spawns a bubble machine when {{control|used}} on a block.
** Continuously blows bubble particles in one direction.
** Destroyed when damaged.
** Can be toggled off by {{control|using}} it.

* [[File:Bubble Wand.png|32px|class=pixel-image]][[File:Bubble Wand render.png|32px]] Bubble Wand
** Blows bubbles in front of the player when {{control|used}}.
** Has a short cooldown.

* [[File:Candy.png|32px|class=pixel-image]]Candy
** Dropped from pinata creepers.
** Can be eaten to restore {{hunger|1}} .
** Grants [[Jump Boost]] for a short duration.

* [[File:Confetti Cannon.png|32px|class=pixel-image]][[File:Confetti Cannon render.png|32px]] Confetti Cannon
** Creates confetti particles in one direction when {{control|used}}.
** Has a short cooldown.

* [[File:Confetti Machine.png|32px|class=pixel-image]][[File:Confetti Machine render.png|32px]] Confetti Machine
**Spawns a confetti machine when {{control|used}} on a block.
** Continuously shoots confetti particles in multiple directions.
** Destroyed when damaged.
** Can be toggled off by {{control|using}} it.

* [[File:Creeper Balloon.png|32px|class=pixel-image]][[File:Creeper Balloon render.png|32px]] Creeper Balloon
** Spawns a creeper-themed balloon attached to the block below when {{control|used}}.

* [[File:Cupcake.png|32px|class=pixel-image]] Cupcake
** Grants [[Speed]] for two seconds.
** Can be eaten to restore {{hunger|2}} .
** If the player eats too many cupcakes or candy within a short amount of time, the player gets [[Slowness]] instead of the food's respective effect.

* [[File:Party Villager Spawn Egg.png|32px|class=pixel-image]]Party Villager Spawn Egg
** Spawns a party villager when {{control|used}}, just like any other [[Spawn Egg]].
** Has the Epic Rarity.

* [[File:Pinata Creeper.png|32px|class=pixel-image]][[File:Pinata Creeper render.png|32px]] Pinata Creeper
** Spawns a pinata creeper when {{control|used}}.
** Can be hung by tying it to a [[fence]] or [[wall]] in the air.
** The only source of Candy.

* [[File:Red Balloon (15 Year Party Supplies).png|32px|class=pixel-image]][[File:Red Balloon (15 Year Party Supplies) render.png|32px]] Red Balloon
** Spawns a red balloon attached to the block below when {{control|used}}.

* [[File:Red Party Horn.png|32px|class=pixel-image]][[File:Red Party Horn render.png|32px]] Red Party Horn
** Shows an animation of the party horn being blown and extending when {{control|used}}.
** Has a short cooldown.

* [[File:Yellow Balloon (15 Year Party Supplies).png|32px|class=pixel-image]][[File:Yellow Balloon (15 Year Party Supplies) render.png|32px]] Yellow Balloon
** Spawns a yellow balloon attached to the block below when {{control|used}}.
** Cannot be obtained from Party Villagers, only from the [[Creative inventory|Creative Inventory]].

* [[File:Yellow Party Horn.png|32px|class=pixel-image]][[File:Yellow Party Horn render.png|32px]] Yellow Party Horn
** Shows an animation of the party horn being blown and extending when {{control|used}}.
** Has a short cooldown.

=== Blocks ===
* [[File:15 Year Banner.png|32px|class=pixel-image]][[File:15 Year Banner render.png|32px]] 15 Year Banner
** A [[banner]] with the 15th anniversary logo design.
** Cannot be placed on the sides of blocks.
** Doesn't need a block for support.

* [[File:15 Year Cake.png|32px|class=pixel-image]][[File:15 Year Cake render.png|32px]] 15 Year Cake
** Crafted using one 15 Year Candle and one [[cake]].
** Summons a party villager when lit, who consumes the cake upon being spawned.
** Has the Epic Rarity.
** All of the cakes added in this addon (except cupcakes) ''cannot'' be eaten by players.

* [[File:Bunting Green.png|32px|class=pixel-image]][[File:Bunting Green render.png|32px]] Bunting Green
** A bunting used for decoration.
** Can be placed like a [[Hanging Sign]], but has no Collision Box.
** Doesn't need a block for support.

* [[File:Bunting White.png|32px|class=pixel-image]][[File:Bunting White render.png|32px]] Bunting White
** A bunting used for decoration.
** Can be placed like a [[Hanging Sign]], but has no Collision Box.
** Doesn't need a block for support.

* [[File:Cake Slice.png|32px|class=pixel-image]][[File:Cake Slice render.png|32px]] Cake Slice
** A slice of cake with a small [[berry]] on top.

* [[File:Confetti (15 Year Party Supplies).png|32px|class=pixel-image]][[File:Confetti (15 Year Party Supplies) render.png|32px]] Confetti
** Can be placed in patches of 1, 2, 3, or 4 on a block, similar to [[Pink Petals]], [[Wildflowers]], and [[Leaf Litter]].
** They connect to fences and walls. this is a known issue with most addon/ [[Mash-up pack|mashup]] items.
** [[File:Giant Cake Center.png|32px|class=pixel-image]][[File:Giant Cake Center render.png|32px]] Giant Cake Center
*** The center of Giant Cakes.

* [[File:Giant Cake Corner.png|32px|class=pixel-image]][[File:Giant Cake Corner render.png|32px]] Giant Cake Corner
** The corner of Giant Cakes.

* [[File:Giant Cake Edge.png|32px|class=pixel-image]][[File:15 Year Party Supplies Giant Cake Edge render.png|32px]]
*  Giant Cake Edge
** The edge of Giant Cakes.

* [[File:Green Present.png|32px|class=pixel-image]][[File:Green Present render.png|32px]] Green Present
* A green present with a white wrapping.

* [[File:Pile of Presents.png|32px|class=pixel-image]][[File:Pile of Presents render.png|32px]] Pile of Presents
** A pile of three presents, these include a Red Present, A Green Present, and a Purple Present.

* [[File:Purple Present.png|32px|class=pixel-image]][[File:Purple Present render.png|32px]] Purple Present
* A purple present with a pink wrapping.

* [[File:Sparkler (15 Year Party Supplies).png|32px|class=pixel-image]][[File:Sparkler (15 Year Party Supplies) render.gif|32px]] Sparkler

* [[File:Red Present.png|32px|class=pixel-image]][[File:Red Present render.png|32px]] Red Present
* A red present with a yellow wrapping.
* [[File:White Present.png|width=32x32]][[File:15 Year Party Supplies White Present render.png|32px]] White present
* A white present with a green wrapping.

=== Mobs ===
*[[File:15 Year Party Supply Party Villager render.png|50px]] Party Villager
** Spawns when a 15 year cake is lit using flint and steel, consuming the cake upon being spawned. This happens even if there are already party villagers in the world.
** Gives individual anniversary items, similar to trading but without any currency, they give you the items upright.
** Cannot be [[Damage|hurt or killed]], and doesn't [[despawn]]. Instead the player can be despawn it on command in the bottom of the item UI.
